RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Claiming Purse 7000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAUI SUNRISE went to the front to a clear unchallenged lead and set all the pace to prove best. COWGIRLLOVER was roused to be off the pace down the backstretch then made a two wide bid at the five sixteenths pole but was no match for the winner and was a clearly second. ISLAND BEAUTY stalked the pace from four wide on the backstretch then moved up slightly around the turn, drifted in down the stretch and was up for the show. LAST AMIGA saved ground while racing in the middle of the pack around the turn, floated out going into the stretch and had to angle back to the inside and improved position on the rail. YOUR CALL rushed up to contention from three wide and chased the leader around the turn and tired. MUCH ABOUT ONE remained back and was not a threat. QUIK STORM bobbled leaving the gate, trailed the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirllover
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused, off pace, 2w5/16, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Last Amiga
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, middle of pack, float out, inside stretch, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Your Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contention, 3w, chased leader, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Quik Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble start, trailed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Much About One
ENTRY.OWNER: J and E Performance Horse Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Maui Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, unchallenged, best

ENTRY.NAME: Island Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, moved up turn, drift in stretch, up show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 42. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLYING LADY was off the pace on the inside through the turn then moved out to three wide in upper stretch and drove past the leaders to prevail. MS BUMBLEBEE went to the front to take the early lead then was over taken at the three furlong marker and vied for the lead around the turn but reclaimed the lead at the top of the stretch but was caught late. ITHOUGHTIKNEW vied for the early lead then tracked the leaders around the turn, moved out to four wide in upper stretch to make a late run but was outfinished. JUST A SEC rushed up from seven wide to the turn and took the lead at the three furlong marker to the top of the stretch, fought gamely in the stretch but tired late. WHEREDIDITGO had no early speed, saved ground but was not a threat. HIGH ON LIFE raced near the back and was not a factor. DESERT PEPPER raced in the middle of the pack from two or three wide and made a mild bid on the turn then dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, 3wupper, drove past, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Wherediditgo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, saved ground, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, mild bid turn, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: High On Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Bumblebee
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, vied turn, led 1/8, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Sec
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up 7w, led 3/8, gamely, tired late

ENTRY.NAME: Ithoughtiknew
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, tracked leader, 4wupper, late run, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 7000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNIN BUFFALO was hustled to the front to a clear lead and drew off in the stretch. YOU'RE MY ROCK tracked the leaders down the backstretch then made a rail bid on the turn and split horses at the quarter pole to be second best. SPUD EXPRESS was off slow and trailed the field from six wide down the backstretch, made a rail bid on the turn and rallied from the inside. LUCKY LIQUOR SHOT was off the pace down the backstretch, moved out to three wide in upper stretch but failed to menace. FUSAICHI WILDCAT stalked the pace from four wide but was not a threat. BUZZ SHINER was forwardly placed to the three furlong marker and was done, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Runnin Buffalo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, clear lead, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Liquor Shot
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3wupper, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Buzz Shiner
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3/8, done

ENTRY.NAME: Spud Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, 6wbackstretch, rail bid turn, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, rail bid turn, split horses 1/4, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Fusaichi Wildcat
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Barton Ranch Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4w, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 12500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACIE'S A TIGER roused to the front to take a clear lead and set all the pace, was kept to task in the stretch. LOTSA LACE had brief speed away from the gate then settled off the pace and was clearly second best. JEWEL OF DENIAL tracked the leader from three wide while racing evenly. HERE AND VOW trailed the field to the turn, saved ground around the turn and passed tiring rival. SIGRID chased the leaders down the backstretch, moved out to four wide at the three furlong marker but failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Sigrid
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Rusty Wire Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, 4w3/8, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Lotsa Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, settled off pace, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie's a Tiger
ENTRY.OWNER: Hickey Wendy Luedtke Walter and Martinez Jr O A
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, set pace, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Here and Vow
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground turn, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Jewel of Denial
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader 3w, evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST CALL ME KEN trailed the field to the turn then made a mild rail bid on the turn, kept on and rallied on the inside to be up in the final jumps. MUCHO GIFTED settled off the pace while saving ground through the turn then made a late two wide run in the stretch with strong strides late. NO LIMITATION raced near the back in the early going, then made a three wide bid around the turn but was out run in the early stretch but gave late effort to just get up for the show. DIVINE TASK roused to vie for the lead from two wide to the seven sixteenth pole then fell back slightly on the turn but didn't make a rally. ITS A DEAL went to the front to set the pace but was collared in the final sixteenth and finished gamely. KNIGHTED raced near the back and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Call Me Ken
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri Barton Ranch Stables LLC and Henderson Charles C
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild bid turn, rallied inside, up final jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Gifted
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground, late 2wrun, strong strides late

ENTRY.NAME: Its a Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, collared 1/16, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Knighted
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: No Limitation
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 3wbid turn, late effort

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Task
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w, fell back, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASH EXPRESS went three wide into the first turn then steadily advanced down the backstretch, engaged the leader at the three furlong marker and dueled outside of leader to the three sixteenths pole and edged away to draw clear late. FRIENDLY FOE settled off the pace on the inside through the final turn then angled out to three wide at the quarter pole for a late rally but was not enough. IMPASSIONED CLAIM went to a clear lead to the seven sixteenths pole then was headed at the three furlong marker and matched strides with outside rival to the three sixteenths pole and weakened. CHICKEN N BISCUIT raced near the back and was not a threat. SHADYFIED was unhurried around the first turn, made a mild bid near the three furlong marker but was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Friendly Foe
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, 3w1/4, late rally, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Impassioned Claim
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, headed 3/8, duel turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Shadyfied
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, mild bid 3/8, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Chicken N Biscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st, steady advance, engage 3/8, duel turn, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 12500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUICKTRIP VAN was last away, moved up going four wide at the half mile marked and kept on to run down the leader in deep stretch and drew clear. BRAYBRAY vied for the lead from the two path and engaged the leader at the five sixteenth pole, matched strides to the eighth pole but was overtaken to be second best. JONO sprinted away from the gate to take a clear early lead but was headed at the five sixteenths pole and match strides with rival to the eighth pole and weakened. LETTHERAINSETTLEIT raced near the back going three wide at the half mile marker and between horses at the seven sixteenths pole while racing evenly. BIG JACK chased the field and passed tired on in the stretch. AUTISM WARRIOR was off the pace on the inside to the seven sixteenth pole and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Autism Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, passed tiring one

ENTRY.NAME: Lettherainsettleit
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 3w1/2, between 7/16, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Quicktrip Van
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, 4w1/2, ran down leader, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Jono
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, headed 5/16, duel to 1/8, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Braybray
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w, engaged 51/6, duel to 1/8, overtaken, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED AT THE CURRENT 2023 BALLY'S ARAPAHOE PARK MEET AND HAVE NOT FINISHED 1ST, 2ND OR 3RD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BIZ was off the early pace while moving up to engage the leader at the seven sixteenth pole, shared command to the quarter pole then inched away to win going away. CLEARLY MAD had good speed but was headed at the seven sixteenth pole, shared command to the quarter pole and held on for the place. THORNISH raced near the back while saving ground to the quarter pole then angled out to four wide in upper stretch for a late rally and missed the place. POLICY LIMIT raced close up to the seven sixteenths pole on the inside while racing evenly. CHERUBIM raced in the middle of the pack to the turn then gained ground on the leader from three wide around the turn and tired. MY TRUE REWARD raced in the middle of the pack to the turn but failed to menace. BRON AND THE BROW trailed the field while racing wide throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Policy Limit
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early, inside, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Thornish
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, saved ground, 4wupper, late rally, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Clearly Mad
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed, headed 7/16, shared command, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Big Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, engaged 7/16, shared command, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rhianon Farms, Inc. and Phoenix Farm

ENTRY.NAME: My True Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Bron and the Brow
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, wide trip

ENTRY.NAME: Cherubim
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, gaining 3w, tired
